plot: This film shows a tot about four years old playing and romping with a huge bear. The child appears to enjoy the sport and shows no fear of bruin, who is one of the largest black bears in captivity.
title: Small Boy and Bear, Hagenbeck's Circus
plot_es: This film shows a tot about four years old playing and romping with a huge bear. The child appears to enjoy the sport and shows no fear of bruin, who is one of the largest black bears in captivity.
original_name: Small Boy and Bear, Hagenbeck's Circus
